text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE VICE PRESIDENT
Mailing Address
I 19 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
December 5, i960
Mr. William G. Harley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Rooms 1119-1121
DuPont Circle Office Building
13^6 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Herewith the results of the recent balloting for our Board of Directors.
You have already received an informational copy of the memo I had to
send out to Regions V and VI in the hope that the present ties -will be
resolved as soon as possible.
Region I - A1 Predette (i had originally prepared the aforementioned
memo for mailing late December 1 - the deadline for submission of ballots -
and Region I also had a tie, but a telegram received about 4:30 that afterÂ¬
noon from Burdick, casting his vote for Fredette, broke that tie and resulted
in the written in (or crossed out) corrections on the memo).
Region III - Jim Miles.
Region V - Tie between Bob Schenkkan and Ed Browne.
Region VI - Tie between Ken Eager and Burt Harrison.
Director-at-large - Ken Christiansen.
Individual Member Director - Harry Skomia.
As you already know, all three TV Directors up for re-election were unopposed
(Hurlbert, Schwarzwalder and Stone) and were automatically elected, which
fact was known at the time of the convention.
Offices at 59 East Armory, Champaign, Illinois
